hydro_uniform_flow Module Reference

Interfaces for user to provide flow and area. Replaces the connectivity with HYDRO at this point. More...

List of all members.

 Set constant flow and area that will be used in the no_flow hydro interface.

real(stm_real) reversal_time = LARGEREAL
 Time flow direction switches.

Detailed Description

Interfaces for user to provide flow and area. Replaces the connectivity with HYDRO at this point.

Member Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine hydro_uniform_flow::set_uniform_flow_area ( real(stm_real), intent(in)  flow,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real), intent(in), optional  reverse_time 
)

Set constant flow and area that will be used in the no_flow hydro interface.

Parameters:
[in]flowConstant flow to be set
[in]areaConstant area to be set
[in]reverse_timeTime at which flow will reverse direction
subroutine hydro_uniform_flow::uniform_flow_area ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  flow,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  flow_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  flow_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  area,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  area_hi,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Simple hydrodynamic interface for constant area and constant flow.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]timeTime of request
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
[out]flowCell and time centered flow
[out]flow_loLow face flow, time centered
[out]flow_hiHigh face flow, time centered
[out]areaCell center area, old time
[out]area_loArea lo face, time centered
[out]area_hiArea hi face, time centered
